edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.ui.simple
Interface FactoryDynamicUI.DlgPreserveState

Enclosing class:
FactoryDynamicUI
public static interface FactoryDynamicUI.DlgPreserveState

The DlgFilterInput instance will have to support UI state preservation between orientation changes, but the class won't know what its UI elements are. The buildUIForFilter will instead set an instance of this handler in the dialog, and the dialog can call these two methods when needed to save and load UI state.

Method Summary
 void loadState(SharedPreferences state)
          Called to restore the dynamic dialog to its saved state.
 void saveState(SharedPreferences.Editor prefsEditor)
          Called when the dynamic dialog should save its state.
